snippet: A drug that scientists had hoped would help prevent breast cancer has a significant side effect.
abstract: Dr Angela M Cheung study published in journal The Lancet Oncology finds drug exemestane, which was welcomed for its potential to prevent invasive breast cancer in women with higher risk of the disease, poses risk of bone loss.
lead_paragraph: A drug that scientists had hoped would help prevent breast cancer has a significant side effect.

headline.seo: Exemestane, Thought to Prevent Cancer, Also Causes Bone Loss
headline.main: Cancer-Deterring Drug Found to Harm Bones
headline.print_headline: Cancer-Deterring Drug Found to Harm Bones
